text: This church can be access from Farrer Road MRT, aling Circle Line.

IBC is God’s home for the nations, and no matter where you’re from—YOU are welcome here! We’re so glad that you can join this local church family that we like to call “a little heaven on earth,” where believers from all over the world gather together as one body to worship and learn the Word of God.
We had a great time visiting this church. The singing was amazing and the speaker was great. There were people from all over the world!! If you need a place to worship while in Singapore do stop in!
Enough supplies and man power. Came alone and straight as I entered, youth pastor can and got my info to know me better. Settled in within the first two months.
A wonderful God-centered church.  Great worship and good thought-provoking sermons.  Friendly people and s loving pastor.  So glad we could visit!
